Class MembershipService

java.lang.Object
com.example.activityscheduler.membership.service.MembershipService
@Service @Transactional public class MembershipService extends Object
Service class for managing Membership entities. Provides business logic for membership operations including CRUD operations, status management, and validation.

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public List<Membership> getAllMemberships()

      Returns:
      a list of all memberships

    • getMembership

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public Optional<Membership> getMembership(String orgId, String userId)
      Retrieves a membership by organization ID and user ID.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the membership if found, empty otherwise

      Returns:
      a list of memberships for the organization

      Returns:
      a list of memberships with the specified status

    • createMembership

      public Membership createMembership(String orgId, String userId, MembershipStatus status)
      Creates a new membership.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      status - the membership status (defaults to ACTIVE if null)
      Returns:
      the created membership
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if organization ID or user ID is null or empty
      IllegalStateException - if membership already exists

    • createMembership

      public Membership createMembership(String orgId, String userId)
      Creates a new membership with ACTIVE status.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      the created membership

    • updateMembershipStatus

      public Membership updateMembershipStatus(String orgId, String userId, MembershipStatus newStatus)
      Updates the status of an existing membership.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      newStatus - the new membership status
      Returns:
      the updated membership
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if organization ID, user ID, or status is null
      IllegalStateException - if membership is not found

    • deleteMembership

      public void deleteMembership(String orgId, String userId)
      Deletes a membership.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if organization ID or user ID is null or empty
      IllegalStateException - if membership is not found

    • existsMembership

      @Transactional(readOnly=true) public boolean existsMembership(String orgId, String userId)
      Checks if a membership exists for the given organization and user.
      Parameters:
      orgId - the organization ID
      userId - the user ID
      Returns:
      true if membership exists, false otherwise
